keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.UCS

Interface Selection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RouletteSelection, TournamentSelection

    public interface Selection

    It is the interface for Selection method. To implement a new selection model, you only have to implement this interface.

    Since:
    JDK1.2

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Written by Albert Orriols (La Salle University Ramón Lull, Barcelona) 28/03/2004, Modified by Xavi Solé (La Salle University Ramón Lull, Barcelona) 03/12/2008

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init(Population pop)
      Initializes the system for selection.
      Classifier makeSelection(Population pop)
      Does make the random selection of a classifier.

    • Method Detail

      • makeSelection

        Classifier makeSelection(Population pop)

        Does make the random selection of a classifier.

        Parameters:
        pop - is the population.

        Returns:
        a Classifier with the selected classifier

      • init

        void init(Population pop)

        Initializes the system for selection.

        Parameters:
        pop - is the population
